query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Design rules applied to silver nanoparticles synthesis: A practical example of machine learning application.

details.authors: Irini Furxhi, Lara Faccani, Ilaria Zanoni, Andrea Brigliadori, Maurizio Vespignani, Anna Luisa Costa

project.title: SAFETYFANS: SAFEty and sustainabiliTY by design: a Framework for Advanced Nano-materials Synthesis.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

category.title: HORIZON TMA MSCA Postdoctoral Fellowships - European Fellowships
category.description: HORIZON TMA MSCA Postdoctoral Fellowships - European Fellowships
category.displayCode: /HORIZON TMA MSCA Postdoctoral Fellowships - European Fellowships

category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

category.title: Topic
category.description: Programme: Part of the Commission work programme implementing legal basis

result.title: D2 Activities during the NIGHT
result.description: D2 month 9 periodic report will report on the buildup and Nights activities that will include the list of activities the Night programmes the number of participants the success rate and possible lessons learnt including a list of Marie SkodowskaCurie fellows involved in the event and an identical list of any other fellows funded under another Horizon 2020Europe funding schemePictures videos and public written testimonies will accompany the report to be potentially used by the European Commission for promotionalcommunication purposes

result.description: There will be a reports on the awareness campaign D1 month 9 periodic report comprising indicators such as actions media feedback activities on Internet such as hits on website number of Facebook shares and likes number of YouTube channel views and number of Instagram followersOne set of samples of promotional material eg posters leaflets programs postcards flyers will be produced along the above mentioned periodic reports

result.title: D6 Awareness Campaign Report ERN23
result.description: There will be a reports on the awareness campaign D2 (month 20, periodic report), comprising indicators such as actions, media feedback, activities on Internet such as hits on website, number of Facebook shares and likes, number of YouTube channel views, and number of Instagram followers.One set of samples of promotional material (e.g. posters, leaflets, programs, postcards, flyers) will be produced along the above mentioned periodic reports.

result.title: D7 Activities during the NIGHT23
result.description: D7 (month 20, final report) will report on the build-up and Night’s activities that will include: the list of activities, the Night programmes, the number of participants, the success rate and possible lessons learnt including a list of Marie Skłodowska-Curie fellows involved in the event and an identical list of any other fellows funded under another Horizon 2020/Europe funding scheme.Pictures, videos and public written testimonies will accompany the report to be potentially used by the European Commission for promotional/communication purposes.
